doc.field: Patricia Volk interview with Loring McMillen
Patricia Volk interview with Loring McMillen

This collection contains a microcassette recording of a circa 1990 interview conducted by Patricia Volk with Staten Island Borough Historian Loring McMillen (1906-1991), Volk's twelve pages of typed notes, and a letter from Volk commenting on the depth of McMillen's knowledge of all things Staten Island. For further details about this collection, and to request it for research, please read its catalog record, or write to reference@nyhistory.org.
